about.title: About
about.text:
I'm a developer focused on Ruby on Rails, passionate about building real-world web applications that solve problems.

I started with front-end but found my true passion in the Ruby ecosystem. Since then, I’ve been specializing in back-end development, studying Rails, data modeling, and API creation.

Even early in my career, I’ve built complete personal projects with authentication, integrations, and deployment. I always strive to write clean code, communicate well, and learn fast. I value simplicity, clarity, and delivering real value.

My current focus is to grow as a Ruby developer, contribute to meaningful projects, and pursue opportunities in collaborative environments — including remote international teams.

If you’re looking for someone committed, growth-minded, and ready to make an impact, I’d love to connect.
